item.title: Attorney General Pushes Indiana Supreme Court To End Lawfare Targeting Pro-Life Speech
item.description: Since 2020, hundreds of Republican attorneys have faced challenges to their law licenses for making conservative arguments in court.

item.title: If Anything, J.D. Vance Was Polite To Europe
item.description: It's hypocritical to rally the free world around defending democracy if Western democracies themselves abandon democratic values.

item.title: Dear Secretary Kennedy: Please Stop Schools From Needlessly Drugging Kids
item.description: I hope Robert F. Kennedy Jr. and the new Make America Healthy Again Commission won’t need prescription stimulants to notice this crisis.

item.title: Your ‘Farm Fresh’ Produce Might Be Fertilized With Forever Chemicals And Human Waste
item.description: Some farms avoid expensive commercial fertilizers by using free treated human sewage, which can contain anything that goes down a sewer.

item.title: Health Policy ‘Experts’ Won’t Give Up Marxist Agenda Despite Election Trouncing
